title: Decentralised Exchanges

title: Derivatives
description: The most popular crypto derivatives are crypto futures, crypto options, and perpetual contracts.

title: Bridges
description: Transfer your tokens from one blockchain to another to take advange of a multichain economic.

description: Lend your tokens and stablecoins, collect yields and use your collateral to take out a loan.

title: Insurance
description: Crypto insurance protects you against losses associated with cybersecurity breaches and loss of funds.

title: Yield Farming
description: Yield farming is an investment strategy that involves lending or staking your cryptocurrency coins or tokens to get rewards in the form of tokens or interest.

title: Asset Manangement
description: Track your wallet address balance across multiple chains.

title: Utilities

description: Useful collection of tools for the NFT conosseur as well as explore the latest market trends.

title: DAO Frameworks
description: DAO Frameworks let you quickly bootstrap a DAO with all the necessary tools.

title: Monitoring
